feature.label: DeltaEcore FeatureIDE Integration (optional, requires FeatureIDE)
feature.description: Integration of DeltaEcore into FeatureIDE. The feature model of FeatureIDE may be used to specify configuration options and to define configurations. During variant derivation, the respective information is automatically transformed to the DeltaEcore pendants in order to employ the back end of DeltaEcore to manifest transformation-based variability in arbitrary model-based languages.
